title: Name your unlucky champion that you do always lose with.
body:
For some reason everytime i play singed I get a dcer in my team that reconnects like 5-10 minutes later into the game. SInged is my unlucky champion.

Edit: wow. didn't expect this many comments!

Edit 2: OMG 115 PEOPLE!

replies.body:
{{champion:4}} 

Irony overload.

Agreed.
I don't believe in the heart of the cards enough.
It's just not in the cards for you to win.
ADCs.  For what it's worth if I'm playing an ADC, I'm probably the last pick.
{{champion:67}}  Don't worry guys I will just e them back so they can get away.

{{champion:53}} That's OK I will pull them back so they can still kill you.

Best botlane NA.

{{champion:37}} 

I want to change that and get better with her so I don't look like a goon with the DJ Sona skin.

For some reason, it's {{champion:238}}. Every time I play him, my botlane ignores MIAs, doesn't ward, and feeds a double kill to my lane opponent, who returns a minute later and kills me as well.

This never happens to me with anyone but Zed.

{{champion:43}} Something, anything, always goes wrong whenever I play Karma. DCs, AFKs, every lane losing, Baron throws, fed Katarinas, people getting caught out 60 minutes into the game. And sometimes I just suck that game, for no good reason.
i guess you can say you have bad {{champion:43}}! HA HA HA HA kill me
{{champion:89}} team never follows up when i engage. NEVER. :'[
{{champion:74}} I always end up mid lane against someone who can safely poke my turrets to shreds.

One time I really wanted to play Heimerdinger top so I first picked it, however a guy goes Singed and is like, whoops, which I'm fine with, however next pick turn a person instalocks Katarina, because she believe she can carry these scrub silvers. I end up playing support Donger, Katarina feeds, jg couldn't do crap, I accidentally got first blood which put us really far behind because I couldn't get my ADC fed. We end up losing ...

*sigh*

I love playing {{champion:81}}, but someone often seems determined to convince me that he's not viable... Even if it requires them feeding for us to lose.

"GG Ez noob champ."

Then post game I often apologize for dealing the most damage to champs in the game...
I hate my friends because Ez is my favorite ADC and they always bitch about how he does "No damage"
Kha Kha.
KHAZIX. REPEAT AFTER ME! KHA ZIGGS
What he really meant was 'Fiddlesticks' obviously. caw caw mofo.
Nah I meant The bug with Giant claws that destroy your family backwards. Oh wait. I meant the bug with foam claws that break when he hits non isolated people.
Every time I play Master Yi, the jungler feeds. Go figure.
What if you're the jungler?
https://99chan.org/money/src/136149063290.jpg

{{champion:236}} I hate playing him, I don't understand how people think he was ever good.

I can go 33/4 on Twitch but for the life of me I can't go positive on Lucian. Wtf.

{{champion:254}}  But ONLY while in the jungle!  For some reason, I'll do very well with her in the jungle: ganks go well, clears are on point, early dragons.  But despite all of this the rest of my team gets ROFLstomped anyway.

It's also the weirdest silence after/during the game.  Because I can feel that people want to blame me (#JunglerProblems) but I was ganking for people and generally doing well so it makes it difficult even for the most delusional player.
{{champion:20}} Every single time somebody picks Nunu on my team we lose.
{{champion:72}} I literally see this guy only once a month or so  but I can't seem to be able to win a game with him on the other team.

Diana.

It doesn't matter if I go 20/5, I can never ever carry games all because of teamfights, fucking irritating.

In previous seasons (season 4/preseason 4) it was {{champion:29}}. Now I have always considered myself a 'decent' Twitch. I practice him in normals and get positive KDAs and win a lot of my games playing him. I don't know why but ranked is a very different story with him. Preseason 4 I played 1 game and went 2/10/10 season 4 I played 2 games and went 2.5/12/10 between the two. ._.

This season it is definitely {{champion:16}}. I held a 55.8% winrate with her last season out of 52 games (29/23) and all but ~2 of those games were post rework. This season I am 0/3 with her, every time I pick her I get paired against a Ezreal, Sej, Yas, Malphite, Leona combo or something equally as stupid. For some reason as soon as I pick Soraka we never have a good front line and their whole line is in the backline on my face. I'm seeing other Rakas do well this season and I know she's still good but for some reason every time I play her this season I just can't do shit.
Ashe

m unlucky champion 
j4 
i can play him i understand him and im preety experienced in jungle 
when i pick him i just fail, dunno why
It depends, some days I lose with {{champion:13}}  or some days I lose with {{champion:121}} ... But I love them both.
J4, 1 win 9 loss in ranked this season while being positive in every single one of those games and pulling off some amazing ganks. Seems to be cursed.
Can't think of a champion i have a losing win rate with (only counting normals/not arams)...Nami or Draven would probably be the worst...actually yea...Draven. lol
Every single one.
Lulu...Defeat never tasted so pruple before...

{{champion:114}} , somehow, but only in ARAM. It's like Headmistress makes people disconnect or something, but it happens noticeably often, and with no one else.

No pick in Rift seems to bring me outright "bad luck", though. I finally gave up on AP {{champion:28}} , because it seemed like every damned time they'd have a {{champion:74}} to make absolutely sure I can never get near him or his team in any fight.

its aatrox... whenever I win lane with him all the other lanes in my team feed to hell
{{champion:266}}

Well there's {{champion:60}} , but she's garbage anyway.
{{champion:7}} Her kit is bullshit and disgusting but god damn it's confusing and I don't feel like learning it since LB represents just about everything I hate in a champion.
{{champion:68}} Darius or Irelia.
Always Darius or Irelia.
{{champion:4}} Fucking Akali.
Every. Single. God. Damn. Time.
I mainly play support and I always lose with {{champion:25}} . So anytime im in ranked i just ban her right off the bat so i dont have to deal with a good morg
I just pick Zyra and make the enemy morg miserable.
The only time I've done the Morg/Zyra matchup it seemed pretty even. I wish I could track down that Zyra again, though. (I was Morgana.)

In midlane, the Morg can continually push Zyra into turret, so it'll probably be in her favor. As supports, though, Zyra can easily pop the black shield with q, constantly poke them out with her q plants, and her e can hit more than one target. Zyra, by level 2 or 3, can start zoning out most enemy bot lanes by herself.

Katarina.
Every time I play her, I either do poorly because the enemy jungle really likes mid, or one lane AFKs, or my botlane does extremely bad.

every champion in the game.  it is sad that no matter how well we all do, and that rarely happens, i have put my foot up people's A$$ to get them to stop chasing  into the jungle for champ kills, or to stop grabbing dragons that we dont need, and get the damn towers that will allow us to win.

THE OBJECTIVE: destroy enemy nexus

HOW TO COMPLETE OBJECTIVE: destroy enemy towers and inhibitors

HOW TO FAIL THE OBJECTIVE: obsess over dragon, baron, and your kda

so for this reason every champion in the game is my unlucky champion that i can't seem to win with unless i threaten to consume my teams souls if they don't get objectives.

To be fair, those dragons do help with pushing down objectives, and baron is useful for sieges. My only advice would be to play someone good at pushing down towers yourself and let them chase while you push.
{{champion:34}}  One of my favorite champions, I usually play pretty decent on her. 0% win rate on her tho.

In ranked it is always {{champion:107}}, If I build him like an assassin I usually snowball lane, but the other lanes are getting so wrecked that even I can't do anything about it. If I build him tanky I usually win lane, but the same thing happens.

I'm looking at you bot lane, feeding a jinx or vayne double kills for days.

{{champion:7}}  every month I try a game with her. I know and understand her mechanics. But my execution falls flat... Miserably. But I still haven't given up hope. Next week is my scheduled loss. Hahaha

To be honest, it might be your builds. Looking at your runes/masteries, and you could definitely improve them. I would suggest switching your seals for armor seals and glyphs for MR glyphs on all your pages. For your AD page, do AD marks, 1 AD quint and 2 attack speed quints. For your AP page (and maybe tank page), do magic pen marks and AP quints. See how that affects your games.
I'll give it it a try. Thanks for the advice :)
